text: Flower on the Stone () is a 1962 Soviet drama movie directed by Anatoly Slesarenko and Sergei Parajanov.В последние дни Брондуков узнавал жену и ХаратьянаЦветок на камне It stars Grigory Karpov, Lyudmila Cherepanova, and Inna Burduchenko. ==Actors== *Grigory Karpov – Grigory Griva, sinker *Lyudmila Cherepanova – Lyuda, the Komsomol of the mine *Inna Burduchenko – Christina, sectarian *Boris Dmokhovsky – Pavel Fedorovich Varchenko, the head of the mine *Georgy Epifantsev – Arsen Zagorny *Mikhail Nazvanov – Zabroda, the librarian == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1962 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Parajanov
title: Flower on the Stone
